Package jnet

package jnet
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Bytes
    Utilities to handle byte-string and byte-object operations.
    CRC
    Utilities to handle CRC32 generation, application, and vertification for network safety.
    Header
    Utilities to handle header generation, application, and verification for socket buffer safety.
    Header.Info
    Wrapper structure for the byte-array representation of a header.
    JClientSocket
    C-style socket wrapper for clients.
    JServer
    C-style server template.
    JServerSocket
    C-style socket wrapper for servers.
    Log
    Utilities to handle logging and output.
